Id.Title: Front End Developer | Project Manager | Entrepreneur
Id.Summary:
As a seasoned Front End Developer with experience from 2014 to 2023, I possess a deep understanding of developing scalable and user-friendly web applications. Throughout the years, I have honed my technical skills in JavaScript, React, HTML5, CSS3, and other front-end technologies. While working as a PMO Project Manager, I successfully developed and managed various projects, enhanced operational methods, and monitored performance.

As the Idea Owner and CEO of a startup with over 100 employees, I led my team to create a widely-used application that provided a viable alternative to traditional school education during the COVID-19 pandemic. This venture allowed me to combine my front-end development expertise and entrepreneurial spirit to produce something meaningful and impactful.

In my recent work, I have continued to expand my skillset by working on front-end projects and developing smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. With my diverse background, I excel at collaborating with cross-functional teams, managing projects, and delivering high-quality results.

CEO.Title: CEO
CEO.Description:
In 2020-2021, our application became the most widely used tool in the country, serving as the primary means for students to continue their learning journey from home.
Implemented aggressive new market strategies that resulted in a revenue increase of 200% above expectations.
Mentored senior managers to enhance employee job satisfaction and performance, leading to improved business outcomes.
Pioneered innovative promotional tactics that expanded customer base, increased market share, and fostered greater engagement and growth.
Successfully negotiated business acquisitions to expand company operations and establish a stronger market presence.
Effectively managed key partnerships and strategic business relationships, skillfully navigating conflict and negotiating favorable contract terms.

Others.Title: Project Manager, PMO
Others.Description:
Creating tailored user manuals for specific system configurations that catered to individual employee skill profiles.
Enhancing operational methods and streamlining accounting procedures for improved efficiency.
Developing and leading projects, ensuring efficient cost management and monitoring performance.
Establishing and nurturing relationships with material vendors, resulting in cost savings and expanded capabilities.

Others.Title: Cryptocurrency Trader
Others.Description:
Compiled and analyzed data to determine approaches to improve performance.
Educated and worked with clients on ROI terms to find accurate solutions.
Generated 250% in revenue by analyzing individual stock, coins and current market conditions in two years.
Prepared contracts and related documentation according to strict standards.
Computed total holdings, dividends or commissions to allocate appropriate payments to customers.
Stick Hardly on Risk Management with fewest possible drawdown

Freelance.Title: Smart Contract developer
Freelance.Description:
Implemented Smart Contracts on ethereum, Binance Chain and Layer 2 Blockchains
Collaborated with Marketing team to review application requirements, plan implementation details and estimate delivery timelines.
Wrote technical documentation to communicate key points to stakeholders.
Built stable and secure systems to translate dense technical topics to stakeholders less versed with blockchain applications.
Implemented, tested and audited open-source software to interact with on-chain smart contracts.
Led projects and analyzed data to identify opportunities for improvement.

Freelance.Title: SPA and Mobile Application for an Ethereum-Based Token
Freelance.Description:
Utilized ReactJS for building the frontend user interface, providing a seamless and interactive experience on both web and mobile platforms.
Configured and deployed the application on an Ubuntu server, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
Implemented Nginx as a web server to handle incoming requests and serve the SPA website, while ensuring proper routing for the mobile application.
Secured the website and mobile application with Certbot, enabling HTTPS encryption and safeguarding user data privacy.
Integrated Web3.js library to establish a connection with the Ethereum blockchain network.
Enabled users to connect their wallets, such as MetaMask, to seamlessly interact with the token functionalities.
Implemented features for buying, selling, staking, and unstaking the token through connected wallets.
Designed the user interface with CSS3 and Material UI, delivering a modern and visually appealing experience on both web and mobile platforms.

FrontEnd.Title: Front End Developer
FrontEnd.Description:
Built a single-page application with multiple views using route services to enhance user experience, utilizing ReactJS and JavaScript (ES6)
Developed front-end user interface components and integrated them with server-side logic using Node.js and Express
Designed REST API endpoints for client-side communication using ReactJS, Redux, and RESTful APIs
Used Bootstrap and Material UI frameworks for building responsive websites for different devices
Wrote unit tests for each new feature using the Jasmine testing framework
Worked in a Scrum environment as part of an engineering team, collaborating with other developers and stakeholders to design and implement features
Experienced in HTML5, CSS3, LESS, and JSON for building and styling web applications
Familiarity with GIT and JIRA for source control and tracking purposes
Proficient in Node.js, MongoDB, ReactJS, Redux, Express, and Webpack for building full-stack web applications.

FrontEnd.Title: Front-End Developer
FrontEnd.Description:
Designed and developed the React-Redux framework to create scalable applications using component-based architecture
Created a search form with various parameters and combinations for data retrieval, utilizing React and RESTful APIs
Wrote, refactored, and tested dozens of new components with a focus on best practices for styling in a large codebase
Developed a rule editor React component for creating and populating rules from API's with conditional statements
Created a React-Redux framework to generate dynamic forms, panels, and pages from user configuration files
Experienced with HTML5, LESS, React, Webpack, NPM, and Yarn for building and styling web applications
Proficient in GIT, JEST, and ESLint for source control, testing, and code quality purposes
Experienced in Visual Studio Code and IntelliJ for development and debugging purposes.

FrontEnd.Title: Front-End Developer
FrontEnd.Description:
Developed, enhanced, and fixed UI bugs using JavaScript, jQuery, React.js, HTML5, and CSS3.
Designed and developed RESTful APIs to consume in UI.
Integrated user-facing elements with server-side logic using Node.js and Express.
Environment: React.js, Node.js, Express, HTML5, CSS3, JSON, Bootstrap.
Created front-end user interface using React.js, HTML5, and LESS to interact with microservices.
Responsible for styling, look, and feel of the web page with LESS that extends CSS with dynamic behaviors such as variables, mixins, operations, and functions.
Environment: React.js, HTML5, LESS, and MongoDB.

Education.Description: Ranked within the top 5 universities in Iran according to the CWUR
Ghiaseddin Jamshid Kashani University - Iran, Qazvin, Abyek

seasonedSkills.Details: In-depth knowledge of JavaScript programming language, including ES6+ features and modern JavaScript frameworks.

Ability to write and execute Bash scripts to automate tasks and improve productivity in Unix/Linux environments.

Quickly adapts to new environments and challenges, demonstrates flexibility in changing circumstances.
Develops and executes strategic plans, identifies opportunities, and makes informed decisions.

Development.Details: Proficient in developing web applications using ReactJS, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
Familiar with Next.js, a framework for building server-side rendered and statically generated React applications.
Extensive experience in managing application state using Redux, a predictable state container for JavaScript apps.
In-depth knowledge of JavaScript programming language, including ES6+ features and modern JavaScript frameworks.
Proficient in using JQuery library to simplify HTML document traversing, event handling, and Ajax interactions.
Experience in developing cross-platform mobile applications using React Native framework.
Proficient in using Git version control system for collaborative development and source code management.
Strong knowledge of HTML5 markup language and its latest features for creating structured web content.
Understanding of UX design principles and ability to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
Expertise in Cascading Style Sheets (CSS3) for styling and layout of web pages with modern design techniques.
Proficient in using Less, a CSS preprocessor, to create more maintainable and modular stylesheets.
Familiarity with Material-UI library, a popular React component library implementing Material Design.
Experience in working with MongoDB, a NoSQL database, for storing and retrieving data in scalable applications.
Proficient in SQL (Structured Query Language) for managing relational databases and writing efficient queries.
Ability to write and execute Bash scripts to automate tasks and improve productivity in Unix/Linux environments.
Familiar with Webpack, a popular module bundler, for optimizing and bundling JavaScript and CSS assets.
Experience in using API testing tools like Postman or Insomnia to test and document RESTful APIs.
Knowledge of common authentication and authorization methods used in web applications.
Proficient in designing and developing RESTful APIs using frameworks like Express (Node.js) or Flask (Python).

Market Technical Analysis.Details: Proficient in using TradingView platform for charting, technical analysis, and market research.
Deep understanding of risk management techniques and strategies in financial markets.
Familiarity with Advanced Elliott Wave theory and its application in market analysis.
Ability to identify and analyze order blocks in price charts for making trading decisions.
Knowledge of Fibonacci retracement and extension levels for determining potential support and resistance areas.
Proficient in recognizing and interpreting common candlestick patterns for predicting price movements.
Skillful in identifying and analyzing market trends to make informed trading decisions.
Ability to identify key support and resistance levels in price charts for determining entry and exit points.
Understanding of risk-reward ratio and its application in evaluating potential trade opportunities.
Proficient in using a variety of technical indicators (e.g., MACD, RSI, Moving Averages) for market analysis.
Ability to identify and interpret chart patterns (e.g., triangles, head and shoulders) for making trading decisions.
Skillful in assessing and managing risks associated with different trading strategies.
